entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `TimeSpan.ToString("c")` alternative that doesn't render days #88062
    Future
  • Implement generational aware analysis GC events #88059
    8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Wasm.Browser.Threads.Minimal sample is failing #88057
    8.0.0
  • Enable Finalizer event in NativeAOT #88056
    8.0.0
  • VTable setup of type WasmLibrary.TestClass failed #88054
  • [mono][ios] Unknown format in import in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #88050
    8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] System.Formats.Tar.Tests are failing with System.ArgumentException #88049
    8.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] : More accurate error messages when failing to map fields or parameters #88048
    Future
  • Blazor Wasm debugging with a proxy #88051
  • X509Certificate2 class unable to read Subject data from some certificates on WSL/Docker containers/Linux #88037
  • Full GC starts every 24 hours after system starting #88035
  • [API Proposal]: ability to have stable hash codes #88031
  • Static field in value type with empty generic causes `TypeLoadException` #88030
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/HugeField2/HugeField2.cmd #88028
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #88027
    8.0.0

Closed

  • if using System.Numerics.Vector.IsHardwareAccelerated return false but the code into if statement #87537
  • Trying to get DOTNET_gcServer to work #88065
  • Wrong computed RID on Alpine Linux alpha / beta releases #73525
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8: Simplify RID Model #71285
    8.0.0
  • Define RIDs for CBL-Mariner #65566
    8.0.0
  • Shared framework is missing correct RID fallback chain for manjaro #62554
    8.0.0
  • AssemblyLoadContext Unload does not release PDB file #66091
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator outerloop test failure #87999
  • Linker CI build failure: Arcade SDK cannot be found in OSX x64 #76680
  • Enable NativeAOT cross-platform build for iOS-like platforms #87764
    8.0.0
  • `runtime-staging` pipeline running on PRs #87958
  • Outerloop crossgen 2 failures: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #87299
  • System.Diagnostics.Process with CreateNoWindow does not redirect stdout/stderr to parent process #68259
    Future
  • LibraryImportGenerator does not respect C# 11 `scoped` modifier on parameters #77624
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT produces static library that makes ld crash #88032
  • [API Proposal]: Additional ToFrozenDictionary overloads with optimizeForReading #87633
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] massive cancellation errors in HTTP/3 #87957
    8.0.0
  • jit-diff produces random diffs on Linux due to relocs #87842
    Future
  • Custom ILLinker substitutions for feature switches don't seem to work on .NET 8 #88015
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make `System.IO.Pipelines.Pipe.Length` from `internal` to `public` #87808
  • HttpClient throws InvalidOperationException for two very different reasons #39758
    Future
  • Resolve workaround for linker 1541 main assembly rooting behavior in AOT compiler #78752
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path improvements #79032
    8.0.0
  • [mono]stackoverflow crash use jit-interp mixed mode #87200

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert Volatile to JIT intrinsics #88073
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set the CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE_SAMETRY on CORINFO_EH_CLAUSE #88072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • TryFindSystemTimeZoneById #88071
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2209838 #88069
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove handwritten binding logic from Logging.Console; use generator instead #88067
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Optimize Vector128<float>/<double>.Equals in interp/jiterp #88064
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix unsafe walking of DacEnumerableHash #88063
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Discard lastIndexMarshalled variable if it is not otherwise used #88060
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Automatically instrument jiterpreter traces if td->verbose_level > 0 #88053
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix dupe word typos. #88047
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • TcpListener should implement IDisposable #88043
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [OSX] When HybridGlobalization mode is on load hybrid icu file #88041
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Workaround for __clear_cache() #88039
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Use compGetTieringName for disassembly output #88033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] The REG_SCRATCH is not conflict with REG_PINVOKE_FRAME. #88029
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add newguid.bat/sh to update jiteeversionguid.h #88022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview6] Bump downlevel version to 7.0.9 #88061
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.10
  • JIT: Stop setting class handles for promoted parameter SIMD fields #87967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Shorter jiterp encoding for zero v128 constants; exploit natural stack alignment #88058
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fall back to the forwarder generator for invalid [In, Out] attributes instead of using the already-selected generator with additional diagnostics #88055
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [nativeaot] Build host bits when targeting iOS platforms with Native AOT #87985
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Remove iossimulator runtime-staging pipeline #88036
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Introduce DOTNET_JITAllowOptionalRelocs #88008
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable scoped parameters in signatures of source-generated interop methods #87987
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Add SelfContained property to the iOS sample app #88042
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Remove optimizeForReading overloads from FrozenDictionary/Set #87988
    area-System.Collections, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Document new STJ diagnostics and fix diagnostic id conflicts. #87980
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add example to doc for UnsafeAccessor #88040
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenericPInvokeCalliHelper arg #87928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [HTTP/3] Fix handling cancelation during QUIC connection establishment #87971
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2208985 #87991
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port FrozenDictionary's length bucket optimizations to FrozenSet #87989
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Fix `--make-repro-path` handling of "ILLinker compatible" parameters #87909
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • minor regex cleanup #88026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Unify Default Comparer logic #88006
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rework JIT<->EE communication for struct promotion #87917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: Enabled embedded broadcast for binary ops #87946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing compiler-generated attributes to corelib #87857
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Track last index in parameter marshalling #87846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    blocking, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • Fix TimeProvider Timer with Infinity Timeout #88024
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement casing functions #87919
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ZipArchive now disposes given stream only once #87982
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux/osx x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Accelerating Vector512.Sum() #87851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Restructure NegotiateAuthentication implementation #87930
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Support filtering property names on dictionary deserialization #87868
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [WIP] System.Linq.Expressions.Interpreter.CallInstruction.CanCreateArbitraryDelegates should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #86758
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Improve debugger performance based on JMC #86982
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix crash happening due to invalid pointer to free() #86868
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize aggregate info iteration in physical promotion #87997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema and output layout #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Pass exact context to getMethodInfo #88025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` locales covering `LocaleStringData`. #87972
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][interp] Add vectorization for Vector4 #87822
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] ILStrip sorts custom attribute table #87933
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono
  • Missing symbol crash fix #86864
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug changes #87979
    area-Debugger-mono
